text: Ndipo iwo amene amapereka chuma chawo ndi cholinga chokondweretsa Mulungu ndi kulimbikitsa chikhulupiriro mâ€™mitima mwawo, ali ngati munda umene uli pamalo pokwera, ndipo pamene mvula igwa pa iwo, umabereka zakudya mowirikiza. Ndipo ngati mvula siigwa, iwo umathiriridwa ndi mame. Ndipo Mulungu amaona zonse zimene mumachita
